alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Macon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 05 at 11:45AM CDT until August 06 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Chariton River near Prairie Hill affecting Macon and Chariton Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chariton River near Prairie Hill. * WHEN...From this morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Fields along the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
